00050 void ServerConnectionHandler::handle(EventPtr &eventPtr) {
00051   uint16_t command = (uint16_t)-1;
00052   int error;
00053 
00054   HT_INFOF("%s", eventPtr->toString().c_str());
00055 
00056   if (eventPtr->type == Hypertable::Event::MESSAGE) {
00057     ApplicationHandler *requestHandler = 0;
00058     uint8_t *msgPtr = eventPtr->message;
00059     size_t remaining = eventPtr->messageLen;
00060 
00061     try {
00062 
00063       if (!Serialization::decode_short(&msgPtr, &remaining, &command)) {
00064         std::string message = "Truncated Request";
00065         throw new ProtocolException(message);
00066       }
00067 
00068       // sanity check command code
00069       if (command >= Protocol::COMMAND_MAX) {
00070         std::string message = (std::string)"Invalid command (" + command + ")";
00071         throw ProtocolException(message);
00072       }
00073 
00074       if (command != Protocol::COMMAND_HANDSHAKE && 
00075           (error = m_master_ptr->renew_session_lease(m_session_id)) != Error::OK) {
00076         ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, eventPtr);
00077         HT_INFOF("Session handle %lld expired", m_session_id);
00078         cb.error(error, "");
00079         return;
00080       }
00081 
00082       switch (command) {
00083       case Protocol::COMMAND_HANDSHAKE:
00084         {
00085           ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, eventPtr);
00086           if (!Serialization::decode_long(&msgPtr, &remaining, &m_session_id)) {
00087             std::string message = "Truncated Request";
00088             throw new ProtocolException(message);
00089           }
00090           if (m_session_id == 0) {
00091             std::string message = "Bad Session ID: 0";
00092             throw new ProtocolException(message);
00093           }
00094           cb.response_ok();
00095         }
00096         return;
00097       case Protocol::COMMAND_OPEN:
00098         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerOpen(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), m_session_id, eventPtr);
00099         break;
00100       case Protocol::COMMAND_CLOSE:
00101         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerClose(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), m_session_id, eventPtr);
00102         break;
00103       case Protocol::COMMAND_MKDIR:
00104         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerMkdir(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), m_session_id, eventPtr);
00105         break;
00106       case Protocol::COMMAND_DELETE:
00107         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerDelete(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), m_session_id, eventPtr);
00108         break;
00109       case Protocol::COMMAND_ATTRSET:
00110         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerAttrSet(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), m_session_id, eventPtr);
00111         break;
00112       case Protocol::COMMAND_ATTRGET:
00113         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerAttrGet(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), m_session_id, eventPtr);
00114         break;
00115       case Protocol::COMMAND_ATTRDEL:
00116         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerAttrDel(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), m_session_id, eventPtr);
00117         break;
00118       case Protocol::COMMAND_EXISTS:
00119         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerExists(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), m_session_id, eventPtr);
00120         break;
00121       case Protocol::COMMAND_READDIR:
00122         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerReaddir(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), m_session_id, eventPtr);
00123         break;
00124       case Protocol::COMMAND_LOCK:
00125         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerLock(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), m_session_id, eventPtr);
00126         break;
00127       case Protocol::COMMAND_RELEASE:
00128         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerRelease(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), m_session_id, eventPtr);
00129         break;
00130       case Protocol::COMMAND_STATUS:
00131         requestHandler = new RequestHandlerStatus(m_comm, m_master_ptr.get(), m_session_id, eventPtr);
00132         break;
00133       default:
00134         std::string message = (string)"Command code " + command + " not implemented";
00135         throw ProtocolException(message);
00136       }
00137       m_app_queue_ptr->add(requestHandler);
00138     }
00139     catch (ProtocolException &e) {
00140       ResponseCallback cb(m_comm, eventPtr);
00141       std::string errMsg = e.what();
00142       HT_ERRORF("Protocol error '%s'", e.what());
00143       cb.error(Error::PROTOCOL_ERROR, errMsg);
00144     }
00145   }
00146   else if (eventPtr->type == Hypertable::Event::CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED) {
00147     HT_INFOF("%s", eventPtr->toString().c_str());    
00148   }
00149   else if (eventPtr->type == Hypertable::Event::DISCONNECT) {
00150     m_master_ptr->destroy_session(m_session_id);
00151     cout << flush;
00152   }
00153   else {
00154     HT_INFOF("%s", eventPtr->toString().c_str());
00155   }
00156 
00157 }
